name: Website Builder
desc: Advanced drag-and-drop website builder app with export functionality. Built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Electron, and PyQt5.

name: Food Token Booking System
desc: Web app for daily food token bookings with time restrictions, PDF generation, and SMS/email notifications. Built using Python and Flask.

name: Sign Language to Text
desc: ML-based sign language recognition system using EfficientNet and PyTorch. Converts hand gestures to real-time text.

name: Emotion Recognition
desc: Real-time emotion detection from webcam feed using CNN model and FER2013 dataset, with emoji overlay via Flask backend.

name: Car Price Prediction
desc: ML regression model predicting car prices based on parameters like mileage, fuel type, and transmission.

name: Unemployment Analysis
desc: Interactive data analysis of unemployment trends using Python, Pandas, and Matplotlib. Insights visualized via graphs.

name: CRM Chatbot
desc: Flask-based chatbot using DistilBERT for intent recognition, entity extraction, and session memory for CRM support.

name: Resume Builder App
desc: React-based single-page app to dynamically generate resumes from user input with export to PDF feature.

name: TSP Path Optimizer
desc: Java-based console app using heuristics for solving Travelling Salesman Problem with performance constraints.

name: Covid19 Dashboard
desc: Data visualization dashboard showing global and country-level COVID-19 stats using Dash and Plotly.

name: Blog Website with Admin Panel
desc: A full-stack blog platform with user auth, blog creation, and admin dashboard. Built with Flask and SQLite.

name: Real-Time Chat App
desc: Socket.IO based chat application allowing multiple users to connect and chat in real-time with custom rooms.
